title: Latency issues
body:
Ok so I got a weird one I need help with here and if anyone's got a solution to this I will appreciate you forever.

SO.. I've been playing on NA the last two days, my latency is somewhat bearable, it's not great but it's still somewhat playable, I've got a consistent 214 latency which I can work with, this is mainly so I can play some games with a friend of mine from NA, anyways, now that you know that here comes the weird shit.. I am from NZ and when I play on oce my latency is a stable 54-60, pretty much whats happened is since playing on NA and then coming back to oce, my latency on oce has shot up to a stable 327-328 MS.. pretty much unplayable, and here's the weird shit, I can log back onto NA and my latency is a stable 214 still, nothings changed about it, my connection to oce is no longer 54-60 MS it's changed completely to this and I don't know wtf has happened.

TLDR: OCE stable MS is 54-60 is now 328 after playing on NA, NA latency has not changed which is 214 it's just my connection to OCE that has changed... solution?

replies.body: Ayo! Can you try the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article and let me know if anything works? Thanks!

OK it's fixed, I got really impatient last night and ended up uninstalling the game completely and just reinstalled and my latency has re-shifted back to normal! hooray

Anyways thanks for the reply I did browse through some of the troubleshooting connection issues that you linked and I think one of the solutions on that template would of been Release/Renew IP and Flush DNS, something about how my IP was being routed after playing on NA is what I believe was causing me the issue in the first place, of course a full reinstall reverts anything like that but the solution that troubleshoot provides is also something i can use if it does occur again.

Thanks for the extra solution :D
Yay! I'm berry happy to hear that! Feel free to let me know if you encounter any problems in the future :3
